attributes.action: Keep the Hitchin store B&Q open
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: B&Q hitchin is the major DIY store in hitchin and due to a new warehouse in stevenage opening we have been put on the closure list, our customers and staff are against this discisson and want the store to remain open!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
